amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 115-830 to reduce and increase by $36,000,000 the amount of funding appropriated to the Bureau of Indian Affairs construction account for public safety and justice facility construction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
